subject: Speaking Opportunity - Digital Marketing Conference 2025
body:
Dear Alex,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out from the University Digital Marketing Research Center regarding our upcoming Digital Marketing Conference 2025, scheduled for November 14-16.

Based on your recent work in AI-driven marketing campaigns, we would like to invite you to speak on a panel about "The Future of Personalized Marketing." The session would be 45 minutes including Q&A, and we can offer a $2,000 honorarium plus travel expenses.

The conference attracts over 800 marketing professionals and academics. Would you be interested in participating? If so, I'd love to schedule a brief call to discuss details.

Best regards,
Dr. Rachel Green
Conference Program Director
